name: Sony VGP-BMS77 Bluetooth Laser Mouse
Features: [The ultra-modern design combined with Bluetooth technology makes this mouse highly mobile and comfortable to use., Included non-contact rechargeable cradle makes for a sophisticated design which helps prevent slipping. Once cradled, the mouse begins to charge., Laser technology provides users the ability to use a mouse on virtually any surface for smooth and precise navigation., High quality surface has a leather like finish making it comfortable to use., Adjustable sensor resolution of 800, 1200 and 1600 dpi., Convenient back and forward buttons make web browsing easy., Approximately 1 month of battery life on a full charge., Low friction, non-stick PTFE sole reduces strain on hand and allows for easy and swift movement.]
